attributes.action: Close all universities down for an appropriate amount of time amidst COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: To prevent the spread of COVID-19
attributes.background: We would like the government to to consider closing universities down in the coming weeks or as soon as possible, in addition to taking necessary actions to prevent further spread
